app_descript:
PrettyLittleThing

Brief: PrettyLittleThing mobile app is your ultimate fashion companion, enabling you to easily shop for the latest affordable women's fashion. Designed for the fashion-conscious shopper on-the-go, the app provides a seamless and user-friendly experience to fill your wardrobe with your dream outfits. Get exclusive access to offers, a hassle-free shopping experience, and stay up-to-date with new styles added every day.
